caption: The guy say he cannot take care of me but I should have a good day . He didn’t give me a reason???? People can come in here without a mask, he do not  even wear a mask but I still go there . That use to be my spot but I have to find somewhere that take my business. The lady in there always get my order wrong. But the guy really make me upset when he would not serve me . Zero stars
Services are superb and servers are very friendly
fruit juice is always good service was too but parking sucks

TRASH! Oh man! Where do I start! The smoothies are prepared with more liquid then fruit, they add a bit of fruit & they add a ton of sugar or honey if asked for, everything is extra money even the honey, the people that work there are like so what, defitnetly shady business besides selling smoothies, I’ve gone in 3 times and every time no one is there just a little Mexican lady who does not want to lift a finger or say hello, yoooooooooo! THIS PLACE IS TRASH.

reason why i give this 5 stars is because customer service is amazing they treat you with respect not only that but they prepare the smoothies quickly and perfect its like they put real passion into there drinks i wish i could give it 6 stars.and i was surprised that something like this was on the bronx
Best of the Best Smoothies, Banana Queen is definitely the go to spot for a good smoothie.
I called on the phone and the person that pick up the phone was rude.
I really wish to support my local businesses. But unfortunately customer service is often lacking.

Worker was extremely standoffish. Acted as if he didn’t want to answer our questions or explain how the process works. He wasn’t cheerful at all. We ended up going to Peachwave and drove an thirty min to get there .
Very Bad customer service don’t shop here fruits sit out all day just look fresh

Sure, you may have an A but that's only because of how sanitary you have your shop. Not sure if you realized either but to throw that into someones face about having an "A" differs from the quality of the food. The owner is a liar and he stated the pastelitos were fresh, but as I figured they weren't. They were stale and tasted completely old. Not to mention the owner himself was cocky and stuck up over a question. I suggest he works on his customer service skills because from a previous review it's been told that he clearly hasn't changed. I wouldn't reccommend going here at all for pastelitos. Maybe for something so cheap, they want to give you the worst quality of food and lies.
Didnt like the smoothie nor the patelitos

Worst experience ever I went in expecting to get a decent smoothie instead it smelled of marijuana and I seen a bunch of guys hanging out smoking cigarettes smh ugh I was so scared to say anything I mean I just wanted a smoothie and a empanada I didn’t wanna get beat up for it smh ugh idk one guy just kept talking about his android phone and a fire that had happened while the other guy was talking about doing lines (of what idk) overpriced and under-serviced I went next dower to get flowers for my wife don’t even get me started NEVER again...

(Translated by Google) One customer was given a wrong empanada, but he realized after putting ketchup on it, he returned it and the owner or manager was cleaning it to put with the others and I told him that it was not correct for him to throw it away, so NO RETURN AND NOT RECOMMENDED.  (Original) A un cliente le dieron una empanada equivocada,  pero se dio cuenta después de ponerle ketchup, la devolvio y el dueño o encargado la estaba limpiando para ponerla con las otras y le dije que eso no era correcto que la tirara a la basura,  asi que NO REGRESO Y NO RECOMENDABLE.
BEST SMOOTHIES EVER *after mom's of course*  so far customer service is fairly descent ad of 7/26/2014

IF I COULD GIVE THIS COMPANY ZERO STARS I WOULD. THE OWNER OF THIS STORE IS A TALL HISPANIC GUY, I'M NOT SURE OF HIS NAME BECAUSE HE WOULDN'T PROVIDE IT. I'M SURE HE WAS AWARE THAT I WOULD REPORT HIS COMPANY. LET ME START OFF BY SAYING HIS CUSTOMER SERVICE SKILLS ARE NOT UP THERE AND HE IS VERY UNPROFESSIONAL. I CAME INTO THE SHOP AND ASKED FOR A SMALL SMOOTHIE WHICH IS $3 AND I ALSO WANTED A CHESSE PATELEO WHICH IS $1. I ASKED HIM WAS THE PATELEOS FRESH AND HE STARED AT ME AND SARCASTICALLY SAID NO THEY WERE SITTING THERE FOR A MONTH, THEN TOLD ME I COME THERE EVERYDAY AND I KNOW THAT THE PATAELEOS ARE $1. I TOLD HIM I KNOW THE PRICE AND THAT I WAS ASKING ABOUT THE FRESHNESS OF THE FOOD BECAUSE PREVIOUS I PURCHASED A PATELEO AND IT WAS A BIT STALE (NOT FRESH). HE THEN GOT OFFENDED AND TOLD ME TO HAVE A NICE DAY AND DIDN'T BOTHER TO SELL ME THE SMOOTHIE AND PATELEO. I WILL NO LONGER BE GOING TO THIS PLACE OF BUSINESS BECAUSE OF POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE.

Rudest lady I've spoken with today, & I'm a social person. Kept picking up then hanging up the phone on me after my first call. Why do you own a phone, or even a business? The guy above me didn't even review the business for the smoothies, just the looks of the employees. Seriously?
The reason why I give this 5 stars is well....let's be serious the guys that work there are eye candy
